import React from 'react' import './navigation.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import logo from '../../assets/navassets/logo.png' import search from '../../assets/navassets/search.svg' import shopping from '../../assets/navassets/shopping.svg' import menu from '../../assets/navassets/menu.svg' import { useEffect,useState } from 'react' function Navigation(props) { const {t,i18n} = props let changecolor = document.querySelector('.Navigation'); window.onscroll = function () { if (document.body.scrollTop >= 200){ changecolor.classList.add('whiteNavigation') changecolor.classList.remove('Navigation') } } return (
  • {t('home.1')}
  • Rooms
  • Pages
  • {t('blog.1')}
  • Portfolio
  • Elements
) } export default Navigation
